kv20.2:5.3: Natthi puthujjanassa paññā pajānanā vicayo pavicayo dhammavicayo sallakkhaṇā upalakkhaṇā paccupalakkhaṇāti?
kv20.2:5.6: nanu atthi puthujjanassa paññā pajānanā vicayo … pe …
kv20.2:5.10: Hañci atthi puthujjanassa paññā pajānanā vicayo … pe …
kv20.2:5.12: paccupalakkhaṇā, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv20.2:6.5: Hañci puthujjano paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjeyya, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv20.2:7.7: ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ samāpajjeyya, viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samāpajjeyya, puthujjano dānaṃ dadeyya … pe …
kv20.2:7.9: cīvaraṃ dadeyya, piṇḍapātaṃ dadeyya, senāsanaṃ dadeyya, gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṃ dadeyyāti?
kv20.2:7.11: Hañci puthujjano gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṃ dadeyya, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv20.2:8.3: Puthujjano tena ñāṇena dukkhaṃ parijānāti, samudayaṃ pajahati, nirodhaṃ sacchikaroti, maggaṃ bhāvetīti?
